description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: 700,000 West Berliners visited relatives in East Berlin during the opening of the checkpoints in the Wall; Dr Erhard, the Chancellor, welcomed in Texas and London; the tiny turret theatre at Sommerhausen; hobbies flourish at Wolfburg's cultural centre; ceramics of Gustave Guhr; figure skating.
